readable.title: 2931950813_93145c4746
readable.content: A boy is posing next to his scooter . A boy stands on a scooter in an abandoned boardwalk . A boy wearing a white top is resting on his scooter beside a concrete post . A small boy on a blue scooter in an urban setting is pointing a finger at the viewer . The little boy stands next to his scooter .
